property.name: Low Luck for Bombing and Territory Damage
Unplaced units live when not placed
Raids May Be Preceeded By Air Battles
Damage From Bombing Done To Units Instead Of Territories
Blitz Through Factories And AA Restricted
Shore Bombard Per Ground Unit Restricted
Naval Bombard Casualties Return Fire Restricted
Subs Can End NonCombat Move With Enemies
Defending Suicide and Munition Units Do Not Fire
Units Can Be Changed On Capture
Units Can Be Destroyed Instead Of Captured
Produce new fighters on old carriers
Move existing fighters to new carriers
Land existing fighters on new carriers
Convoy Blockades Roll Dice For Cost
Damage From Bombing Done To Units Instead Of Territories
Limit SBR Damage To Factory Production
notes
property.value:
== Aggression 1941 ==
A WWII scenario loose based on 1941, inspired from AA50 Anniversary and Big World



Follows v3 Rules with some additions
=== Capitols ===
The capitols of the world powers are as follows (in turn order):
Germany - Germany
Soviet Union - Moscow
Japan - Japan
British Empire - Britain
Italy - N.Italy
United States - E.USA
China - Sinkiang

=== Unit definitions ===
AA50 Cost structure with modifications.
Unit Attack-Defence-Movement--trasport/carrier space--PU cost-notes
Infantry 1-2-1--2---3 artillery supportable
Tankette 1-2-2--3---3 can blitz, Italy only
L.cavalry 1-2-2--3---2 artillery supportable, can blitz, China only
H.cavalry 2-2-2--3---3 artillery, can blitz, China only
Siberian 2-3-1--2---3 artillery supportable, Soviet Union only, can be purchased on Siberian factories
Artillery 2-2-1--3---4 artillery
Armour 3-3-2--3---5 can blitz
Tiger 4-4-1--5---9 2HP, Germany only
Kamikaze 3-0-3--1---3 suicide, destroyed when captured, ignores trench, strategic bomber, Japan only
Biplane 1-2-4--1---3 2 air at, 3 air def, can intercept, China only
Fighter 2-3-4--1---5 2 air at, 3 air def, can intercept
Bomber 2-1-6--/---6 2 air at, strategic Bomber
Transport 0-0-2--5---6 can not be taken as casualty
Submarine 2-2-2--/---4 first strike, Germany only
Boat 1-2-1--/---6 destroyer, transport, Soviet Union only
Destroyer 2-2-2--/---6 destroyer
Cruiser 3-3-2--/---9 can bombard
L.cruier 2-2-2--/---4 Japan only
Carrier 1-2-2--/---12 carrier (2)
Battleship 4-4-2--/---16 2HP, can bombard
Trench 0-1-0--/---3 2HP, 1 trench per territory per turn can be placed
Factory 0-0-0--/---/ allows to produce units for initial owners up to territory value, can be damaged up to 2x territory value

Siberia is impassable
Nations don't lose their incomes and placement abilities if their capitals are fallen
Factories cannot be purchased and captured ones cannot be used
Every land and sea units have anti-air ability except transports submarines, destroyers and light cruisers
Suez, Kiel and Panama canals are present
Sicily does connect to S.Italy
Victory Conditions: Controlling total 6 capitals

Navalland
For feedbacks yuksely1992@gmail.com
